video.title: The Guardian
video.synopsis: A lawyer is working off a drug conviction with 1,500 hours of court-mandated community service, while trying to mend his relationship with his dad.

episodes.synopsis: Nick Fallin, a high-powered attorney living the good life, is brought down to earth when he has to pay the price for his indulgent lifestyle.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Nick brings a lawsuit against a pharmaceutical company, Bendaprine, on behalf of Hunter Reed and his mother's estate for $10 million.
episodes.title: Reunion

episodes.synopsis: Nick is given the case of a wheelchair-bound boy who is about to be placed in a group home while his mother does time for prostitution.
episodes.title: Paternity

episodes.synopsis: Nick is taken off of the Hunter Reed case and assigned a case about a 15-year-old girl who claims to have been raped by her stepfather, a cop.
episodes.title: Lolita?

episodes.synopsis: Nick encounters problems with his 16-year-old gay client who had been arrested for solicitation.
episodes.title: The Men from the Boys

episodes.synopsis: Nick is duped into representing a young woman who lied to him after they spent the night together.
episodes.title: Indian Summer

episodes.synopsis: CLS expands its circle of operation to include all people needing legal aid, not just minors.
episodes.title: Feeding Frenzy

episodes.synopsis: Nick Fallin finds himself the advocate for a 12-year-old girl, Lesley, who needs to be adopted immediately in order to receive a heart transplant.
episodes.title: Heart

episodes.synopsis: Alvin asks Nick to help Barbara after her teenage son is arrested for drug possession.
episodes.title: The Funnies

episodes.synopsis: Nick defends an Arab American man who appears to be the victim of a hate crime.
episodes.title: Loyalties

episodes.synopsis: Nick, now working at another law firm, is reinstated as the guardian of young Hunter Reed, his first case.
episodes.title: Home

episodes.synopsis: For the first time since leaving Fallin & Associates, Nick goes head to head with his father, Burton, in a corporate father-and-son case.
episodes.title: Causality

episodes.synopsis: After a rough turn of events at Kirk & McGee, Nick is back at Fallin & Associates just as Burton is looking into the case of Susan Newberg.
episodes.title: Privilege

episodes.synopsis: Nick's Aunt Liz visits Burton and Nick to tell them that she is dying of cancer and wants to start a trust fund for her rascal son.
episodes.title: Family

episodes.synopsis: Nick had helped a woman regain custody of her kids, but he believes she might still be using drugs.
episodes.title: In Loco Parentis

episodes.synopsis: Nick takes a case involving a factory strike, which creates a conflict of interest because the Fallins are representing the management.
episodes.title: Solidarity

episodes.synopsis: Nick tries to help two brothers get adopted, but problems arise when the foster parents only want the "gifted" brother.
episodes.title: The Divide

episodes.synopsis: When a mother of a missing child shows up in Nick Fallin's office at Legal Services, he finds himself in the middle of an emotional struggle.
episodes.title: Mothers of the Disappeared

episodes.synopsis: Nick's parole officer asks for legal help from Nick in exchange for a favorable report.
episodes.title: Lawyers, Guns and Money

episodes.synopsis: Lulu and her fiancé, Brian, are thinking of buying a home. Nick goes with them only to find teenagers in the house -- and the girl is giving birth.
episodes.title: Shelter

episodes.synopsis: Burton turns his law firm over to Senator Nathan Calldwell as he readies himself to become a federal judge.
episodes.title: Chinese Wall

episodes.synopsis: Stunned by the new leadership at Fallin & Associates, Nick considers starting his own firm. Meanwhile, a drug-addicted killer stirs up trouble.
episodes.title: The Beginning

episodes.synopsis: Burton tries to save Nick, who is behind bars temporarily for drug possession, by looking for a defense in Mandy's daughter, Shannon.
episodes.title: Testimony

episodes.synopsis: A 13-year-old is charged with the rape and murder of his mother and could be tried for first-degree murder.
episodes.title: Monster

episodes.synopsis: Burton's past comes back to haunt him as he gets close to becoming a federal judge.
episodes.title: The Dead

episodes.synopsis: After deciding to work together, Nick and Burton Fallin return to the old offices of Fallin & Associates to create a new firm, Fallin & Fallin.
episodes.title: The Next Life

episodes.synopsis: Alvin, head of Legal Services of Pittsburgh, is unexpectedly arrested during a police raid of a massage parlour.
episodes.title: Assuming The Position

episodes.synopsis: As the legal guardian of two siblings he represented the year before, Nick must find the missing sister so she can be a bone-marrow donor.
episodes.title: The Living

episodes.synopsis: Nick takes on the case of two children after their brother dies from their father's neglect.
episodes.title: The Innocent

episodes.synopsis: Lulu represents an old friend after one of her adopted children is found dead. Nick represents someone he knew as a kid.
episodes.title: The Neighborhood

episodes.synopsis: Nick has to represent James' nephew, Levi, who may be sent to juvenile detention for refusing to identify who beat him up in reform school.
episodes.title: The Dark

episodes.synopsis: Nick takes the case of a 16-year-old mother who wants to put her baby up for adoption.
episodes.title: Sacrifice

episodes.synopsis: Nick helps a chatty 18-year-old boy named Jesse stay in the shelter by offering him a part-time job to save for college tuition.
episodes.title: No Good Deed

episodes.synopsis: A break-in at Lulu's home forces Nick to protect her. Nick takes the case of a former child star who claims his parents want him to leave their house.
episodes.title: You Belong to Me

episodes.synopsis: Lulu's mom comes to town to offer her daughter a job. Nick soon learns of Mrs. Novack's bad business practices, which causes a problem.
episodes.title: Ambition

episodes.synopsis: Nick meets Sam at a gala in Burton's honor. Sam, who is a transvestite, tries to get custody of his lover's son.
episodes.title: Understand Your Man

episodes.synopsis: A college roommate of Nick's wants to test a device for tracking kids. Will Nick agree to testing the tracking device on L.S.P. kids?
episodes.title: Where You Are

episodes.synopsis: A tough case involving a sick baby brings Nick and Lulu closer together when Lulu gets attached to the mom.
episodes.title: The Weight

episodes.synopsis: Caroline Novack returns to find out that Nick and Lulu were in a car accident -- which could proves disastrous for Lulu.
episodes.title: The Intersection

episodes.synopsis: The past comes back to haunt both Nick and Burton when a drug dealer from Nick's past is shot and Burton's new client is the police officer.
episodes.title: My Aim Is True

episodes.synopsis: Caroline Novak goes before a Grand Jury that will look into her bad business practices.
episodes.title: Back in the Ring

episodes.synopsis: Nick and Lulu get closer in their relationship, but can they keep their feelings for each other hidden as they argue a case in court?
episodes.title: What It Means to You

episodes.synopsis: Burton tries to stop Shannon from being hurt. And Alvin catches Nick and Lulu at the office late. Will they still have jobs after Alvin finds out?
episodes.title: Burton & Ernie

episodes.synopsis: Nick hands Taliek's case file to James, who goes before Judge Rebecca Damsen to seek custody.
episodes.title: Sensitive Jackals

episodes.synopsis: Nick is upset because Lulu is about to take a job in California, and while he's in court he loses control of his temper.
episodes.title: All the Rage

episodes.synopsis: The season premiere begins with scenes from last season's finale, leading up to Burton and Nick heading for the concert that was to start at 7:30 PM.
episodes.title: Carnival

episodes.synopsis: Nick tries to help a young lady who has cancer. But he fails to get the insurance company to help her out, which puts Nick in a bind.
episodes.title: Big Coal

episodes.synopsis: Alvin is having to take on James Mooney's caseload and is trying to stop Lulu from leaving for her new job.
episodes.title: The Line

episodes.synopsis: Lulu starts her job as Director of LSP, leaving Alvin to wonder if he is needed at LSP.
episodes.title: The Father-Daughter Dance

episodes.synopsis: When the bank insists that the firm pay off its loan immediately, Nick is forced to try to collect unpaid fees from delinquent clients.
episodes.title: Shame

episodes.synopsis: Nick and Lulu move into his place and find out how hard it is keep their love life out of the office. Jake learns his parents want a divorce.
episodes.title: Let's Spend The Night Together

episodes.synopsis: Nick runs into a former client while helping in a cleanup project for his community service.
episodes.title: Hazel Park

episodes.synopsis: LSP teams up with Victoria Little to form an AIDS Relief Alliance. Meanwhile, Nick becomes a medical guardian to two kids who may have AIDS.
episodes.title: Believe

episodes.synopsis: Nick tries to find a place for Donny Longo and his grandfather to live together, but Donny has a hard time with Rebecca's ruling.
episodes.title: Let God Sort 'Em Out

episodes.synopsis: After learning that his dad will need surgery to fix his heart, Nick also learns he must keep the firm from losing a merger.
episodes.title: Swimming

episodes.synopsis: Ted's dad goes on a shooting spree, killing himself and his co-workers. This leaves Nick and Suzanne to tell Ted that his dad has committed murder.
episodes.title: Legacy

episodes.synopsis: Nick takes a drug called Beautiful Blue Mystic, not realizing how it will hurt Fallin & Fallin and LSP. Nick tries to get help to kick the habit.
episodes.title: Beautiful Blue Mystic

episodes.synopsis: Nick finds out how hard it is to regain the trust of the people he hurt. Burton feels Nick isn't ready for a heavy caseload.
episodes.title: Amends

episodes.synopsis: Nick learns his unborn baby has Down syndrome. To learn more about it, Nick helps Mark set up a trust fund so he won't lose his Social Security.
episodes.title: All Is Mended

episodes.synopsis: Jake lies to everyone about how he got hurt. But soon Burton and Maureen find out his secret.
episodes.title: Without Consent

episodes.synopsis: Nick tries to find an unwanted foster child a home. Burton gets angry after finding out that Shannon posed for a photographer.
episodes.title: Sparkle (Glow)

episodes.synopsis: Nick sees a change in his dad that worries him: Burton keeps getting dizzy due to vertigo. Burton wonders if he will be a good dad to Shannon.
episodes.title: The Watchers

episodes.synopsis: Alvin has a lot to do in so little time, as he is getting married to Victoria. Nick decides to visit Los Angeles.
episodes.title: The Bachelor Party

episodes.synopsis: At a court hearing, Alvin is asked to turn over his files involving past clients at LSP, but he isn't ready.
episodes.title: Remember

episodes.synopsis: Nick 's future at the firm is in question because of a lawyer Burton thinks quite highly of, but he doesn't feel she is ready to be a partner.
episodes.title: The Vote

episodes.synopsis: Nick 's future at the firm is about to be voted on. As he awaits the verdict, he takes on two cases that involve two boys.
episodes.title: Blood In, Blood Out

episodes.synopsis: Nick takes a job at the law firm of Walter & McNeil. Lulu gives birth to a baby girl.
episodes.title: Antarctica
